This document is the API specification for the Distributed Resource Management Application API (DRMAA) Java[TM] language binding, as defined by the Global Grid Forum DRMAA Working Group.

See:
          Description

Packages
com.sun.grid.drmaa Provides a DRMAA implementation for the N1[TM] Grid Engine software.
org.ggf.drmaa Provides an implementation of the Distributed Resource Management Application API (DRMAA).

 

This document is the API specification for the Distributed Resource Management Application API (DRMAA) Java[TM] language binding, as defined by the Global Grid Forum DRMAA Working Group.

This document only includes the public methods and fields of the API. For the full documentation, including the protected methods and fields, see the online docs.

Since:
0.4.2
Version:
0.5
Author:
dan.templeton@sun.com
See Also:
DRMAA Working Group Homepage, DRMAA Working Group Document Repository, The Global Grid Forum Homepage
